newsitem.title: USA: Tyler COO, president Margerison resigns.
newsitem.headline: Tyler COO, president Margerison resigns.

text.p: Rick Margerison has resigned as president and chief operating officer of Tyler Corp in order to accept an offer outside the company, Tyler said Thursday.

Margerison has stepped down to accept a position as president and chief executive officer of Briggs Weaver Vinson, the distribution group of Sammons Enterprises, it said, adding that he would nevertheless remain on its board of directors.
Bruce Wilkinson, the company's chief executive officer, will assume responsibilities as president, it added.
